languages.name: JavaScript
languages.description: JavaScript is a versatile, high-level programming language primarily used for web development.

languages.name: Python
languages.description: Python is a high-level, interpreted programming language known for its readability and versatility.

languages.name: Java
languages.description: Java is a high-level, class-based programming language designed for portability and cross-platform compatibility.

languages.name: C#
languages.description: C# is a modern, object-oriented programming language developed by Microsoft, widely used for developing Windows applications.

languages.name: Ruby
languages.description: Ruby is a dynamic, open-source programming language with a focus on simplicity and productivity.

languages.name: PHP
languages.description: PHP is a widely-used open-source scripting language that is especially suited for web development and can be embedded into HTML.

languages.name: TypeScript
languages.description: TypeScript is a strongly typed, open-source programming language that builds on JavaScript, giving you better tooling at any scale.

languages.name: Swift
languages.description: Swift is a powerful and intuitive programming language for iOS, iPadOS, macOS, watchOS, and tvOS.

languages.name: Go
languages.description: Go is an open-source programming language designed for simplicity, reliability, and efficiency.

languages.name: Kotlin
languages.description: Kotlin is a modern, statically typed programming language that boosts productivity and is fully interoperable with Java.

languages.name: React
languages.description: React is a popular JavaScript library for building user interfaces, particularly single-page applications.
